name: Kelloggs Corn Flakes, Real Honey
description: Kellogg's Corn Flakes Real Honey and Milk is a nourishing breakfast for your busy mornings. It has the goodness of Corn Flakes combined with delicious natural honey for a nourishing & energetic start to your mornings! All you need to do is just add milk and kickstart your day with this exciting flavour.* Images for illustration purpose only. Product recieved may vary.
